documentation.title: GroupSettings Class [PHP]
documentation.metakeywords: php menu, php drop down menu, javacript menu, dropdown menu
documentation.metadescription: KoolMenu is great PHP Menu control that is easy to use and simple to customize. With semantic rendering, advanced CSS, rich client-side api and myriad of features, KoolMenu stands out to be best choice for your site navigation.
